channel.title: Deathlypvpz V3 - Freezing & Crashing problems
channel.description:
Hello Mopar,
When im in a fight it crashes alot. When im doing skills etc there is nothing wrong. I think it has to do with Switching armour, because when im Hybridding it crashes alot like 3 times in 1 fight and when im Melee maybe 1 sometimes 0.
What can i do? And what is the problem here?
Remco

item.title: Deathlypvpz V3 - Freezing & Crashing problems
item.dc:creator: @remcowp remcowp
item.description:
@remcowp wrote:

Weird thing is that it only happends when im Hybridding.
DeathlyPvpzV3 is a great source btw.

Any way how i delete the newer maps etc?

Read full topic

item.title: Deathlypvpz V3 - Freezing & Crashing problems
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“remcowp, post:1, topic:512574”]Hello Mopar,

When im in a fight it crashes alot. When im doing skills etc there is nothing wrong. I think it has to do with Switching armour, because when im Hybridding it crashes alot like 3 times in 1 fight and when im Melee maybe 1 sometimes 0.

What can i do? And what is the problem here?

Remco[/quote]
Deathlypvpz crash alot prob because the whole rsps can’t handle the newer maps.
It tends to crash if you go certain places in varrock etc etc. So its not the item switching.
Im 100% sure its the maps The clients flooding alittle 2 fast than it can keep up with

Read full topic
